text:
Situation A. Ahman Fills in the Missing Pieces

Ahman's Work: "I noticed that Graph B did not have any matches. I wrote an equation and context ( or story description) that would match Graph B."
• What equation and context did he write?

Equation could include the following:

y = 20 +3x or y = 3x +20 or 3x +20 = y

Contexts could include many different descriptions. Examples include the following:

  • In a walkathon fundraiser, Dominic collected money from donors. He got $20 and $3 per mile that he walked.
  • A taco restaurant charges $3 for every taco. And it has $20 delivery fee.
  • A photographer at a dance charges a $20 setup fee and $3 for every photo that they take.
• Do you and your classmates have the same equation and context?
Equations might vary slightly. But all of them should have a coefficient of 3 and a y-intercept/constant of 20. Contexts could be very different.
